actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax a certain portion of the pay received by members of the Armed Forces who have served at least 4 years.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income a specified portion of compensation received by members of the Armed Forces whose active service period exceeds four years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax a certain portion of the pay received by members of the Armed Forces who have served at least 4 years.
